title: Buff Taliyah
body: I think taliyah was a good champ but i see a video that was funny but 1 month later  taliyah got nerfed she was funny tho play but later taliyah was dead no one plays taliyah  becaus the nerfe was so big  i want a taliyah buff becaus i know taliyah is fun but idk i think taliyah is now a bad champ he does zero damage in the ealy and its hard to come in the late as taliyah sorry for the bad english im not from england im from germany i think we need a taliyah buff and im not the only one ho think that lg lucas

replies.body: Ihre Pick und Winrate ist gerade in High Elo enorm hoch da wird eher ein Nerf kommen als ein Buff.

Willkommen im deutschsprachigen Forum.
Glaubt man op.gg, hat Taliyah eine 53% Winrate. Einen so starken Champion sollte man nicht buffen.
